price: Dan (ingatlah)  Ibrāhīm ketika ia berkata kepada kaumnya, "Sembahlah olehmu Allah dan bertakwalah kepada-Nya.  Yang demikian itu adalah lebih baik bagimu, jika kamu mengetahui.
arabic: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ib'rāhīma idh qāla liqawmihi uʿ'budū al-laha wa-ittaqūhu dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
